extendedInfo.description: The HeavyCalc Pro calculator for your Android smartphone is built with the same features and functions, and the same core engine that powers the industry-standard advanced construction-math calculators from Calculated Industries. No learning curve -- just one powerful, easy-to-use calculator app.Ideal for Engineers, Designers, Excavators, Highway and Heavy Construction â¢ Work directly in and convert between all building dimensional formats: yards, feet-inch-fractions, inch fraction, decimal feet (10ths, 100ths), decimal inches and metric (m, cm, mm)â¢ Easily calculate areas, volumes and weight per volume, and truck loads in imperial/metricâ¢ Quickly calculate square-ups, right anglesâ¢ Simplify and speed up grid-cell and cut/fill estimatesFEATURES:â¢ Created by Calculated Industries, the originator of the award-winning Construction MasterÂ® calculatorsâ¢ Built-in calculator help â just press and hold the desired key for full, clear definitions, explanations and examples of keystrokesDimensional Math and Conversions Including Metricâ¢ Yardsâ¢ Feet-Inch-Fractionsâ¢ Metric (m, cm, mm)â¢ Decimal Feet (10ths, 100ths), Decimal Inches â¢ D.M.S. to Decimal Degree Conversions.Dedicated Functions and Keys Help You Calculateâ¢ Instant Square-up and Drop â¢ Number of Loads: calculate Load volume, number of Loads, Load sizeâ¢ Cut/Fill estimates â proposed and existingâ¢ Shrink and Swell calculations using Compacted, Bank and Loose volumesâ¢ Calculate Percent Grade and SlopeBuilt-in Area and Volume Solutionsâ¢ Length, Width, Height (Depth) keys â¢ Square and Cubic formatsâ¢ Instant Weight per Volumeâ¢ Pounds, Tons, Kilograms or Metric TonsSpecial Functionsâ¢ Entry Editing Backspace Key â with a swipe of a fingerâ¢ Haptic Feedback (optional)â¢ Cost per Unit: Solve unit cost and pricingâ¢ Paperless Tapeâ¢ 4 Memoriesâ¢ User-Definable PreferencesFor: Engineers, Designers, Excavators, Highway and Heavy Construction

reviews.title: Needs color changes
reviews.comment: Orange writing above keys are hard to read against the dark gray on screen.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Valuable
reviews.comment: This is a must have for any public works field worker.
reviews.author: A Google User
